title: Beetroot salad with mustard vinaigrette
ingredients: ['2 beetroot', '60g walnuts, chopped', '1/2 onion, thinly sliced', '200g lettuce, chopped', 'Dressing', '3 tablespoons vinegar', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 tablespoon coarse-grained mustard', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground pepper']
